price: 42.Waxaa ka mid ah kuwo ku dhageysta13, ma adigaase wax maqalsiin kara dhagoolaha iyagoon wax fahmeyn?
arabic: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَسۡتَمِعُونَ إِلَيۡكَۚ أَفَأَنتَ تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ وَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
footnotes: 13. Waa sida inay dhageysanayaan waxa uu akhriyo Rasuulka iyo waxa uu baro, laakiinse quluubtooda ma aqbalaan Xaqa.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum man yastamiʿūna ilayka afa-anta tus'miʿu al-ṣuma walaw kānū lā yaʿqilūna
